value:
Love does not take any one shape...
What does that say about its nature?

Is the way I feel toward the people
of Embla not also a kind of love?

Does Prince Alfonse know what love
is, I wonder? Princess Sharena, on
one hand...clearly does not.

The Day of Devotion is for lovers
to get each other gifts? Is that what
love is about?

I tried to make some sweets to give
as presents. They do not taste good,
but you can have one if you'd like.

An invitation to the Day of Devotion
festival from $Nf.$k$pThere. I've done my job.

If you are happy...I can be happy
as well.

Here. Take this gift... It's a special
thing, just for today.
Love is...difficult.

I wonder... How could I return the
affection you have shown me.

The Day of Devotion makes no sense
to me... I may never understand it.

What is love exactly? Can you explain
it to me with words?$k$pThe feeling you have toward those
dear to you? The feeling of wanting
someone near to you?$k$pI admire my brother, and I feel...
gratitude toward Xander. Are those
feelings not a kind of love?$k$pIt seems I still cannot grasp it.$k$pBut seeing everyone smiling as they
speak of it, I imagine love must be
rather...well, lovely.$k$pIf I ever understand it, I hope to
return to the Day of Devotion festival
again to enjoy it like others do.
たっ
For you...
きゃあっ
もう…
A gift.
This is yours.
For my brother...
It was my idea.
Aren't you happy?
sigh...
I am Veronica. I've heard that today is the Day of Devotion...
Ah! If you startle me, you won't get your gift.
The people I'd like to give gifts to are Bruno...and Xander...
These flowers have a lovely scent.
Thrasir...she is me, but...different.
What I want is...to always have my brother at my side...
If you want a gift, I suppose I could get you one.
What do you want?
What to do...
For you.
